Package com.example.labyrinthapp

Klasse GameScreenFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.labyrinthapp.GameScreenFragment
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class GameScreenFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
A singleton Fragment that displays the game screen and generates random labyrinths.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • GameScreenFragment

      public GameScreenFragment()
      Constructs an instance of the GameScreenFragment class. It also creates and configures a MediaPlayer object to play background music.

  • Methodendetails

    • getInstance

      static GameScreenFragment getInstance()
      Gets an instance of the GameScreenFragment class.

      An instance of the GameScreenFragment class.

    • onCreateView

      public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater, android.view.ViewGroup container, android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Creates the views needed to display the game screen and initializes their corresponding view variables. It also generates the first random labyrinth and sends it to the labyrinthView for it to display.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      onCreateView in Klasse androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      Parameter:
      inflater - The LayoutInflater object that can be used to inflate any views in the fragment,
      container - If non-null, this is the parent view that the fragment's UI should be attached to. The fragment should not add the view itself, but this can be used to generate the LayoutParams of the view.
      savedInstanceState - If non-null, this fragment is being re-constructed from a previous saved state as given here.
      Gibt zurück:
      The View for the fragment's UI.

    • onResume

      public void onResume()
      Starts the background music if sound is turned on. Resets the current player's move direction.
      Setzt außer Kraft:
      onResume in Klasse androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

    • onPause

      public void onPause()
      Pauses the background music if sound is turned on.
      Setzt außer Kraft:

    • sendLabyrinthToView

      public void sendLabyrinthToView()

    • setLabyrinthSize

      public void setLabyrinthSize(int rows, int cols)
      Sets the labyrinth size.
      Parameter:
      rows - Amount of rows (horizontal paths) the labyrinth should have.
      cols - Amount of columns (vertical paths) the labyrinth should have.

    • generateLabyrinth

      public void generateLabyrinth()
      Generates a labyrinth using a modified version of the Recursive Backtracking algorithm. The labyrinth is represented as a 2D array of integers. Paths are represented by 0, walls by 1 and the exit and entrance square by 2. Calls the carvePassages(int row, int col) method to carve the passages.

    • carvePassages

      private void carvePassages(int row, int col)
      Recursively carves passages in the labyrinth starting from the given row and column. It checks neighboring cells in random order and carves a passage if the conditions are met. Conditions: Current square has to be inside the maze (valid labyrinth index) and has to be a wall (represented by 1).
      Parameter:
      row - The starting row for carving passages.
      col - The starting column for carving passages.

    • setTemperature

      public void setTemperature(String temperature)
      Sends the given temperature and the temperatureView to MainActivity's displayStatus function to display the current temperature.
      Parameter:
      temperature - The temperature as a String of either the smartphone CPU or if connected, the MPU6050 temperature.

    • setTimer

      public void setTimer()
      Sends the current value of the timer and the timerView to MainActivity's displayStatus function to display the current in game time.

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel(int level)
      Sends the given level and the levelView to MainActivity's displayStatus function to display the current level.
      Parameter:
      level - The current level.

    • increaseCounter

      public void increaseCounter()
      Increases the timeCounter variable by 1.

    • setGameFinished

      public void setGameFinished(boolean finished)
      Sets the gameFinished flag indicating whether the game is finished or not.
      Parameter:
      finished - true if the game is finished, false otherwise.

      Gets the gameFinished flag indicating whether the game is finished or not.
      Gibt zurück:
